metadata.Title: CVE-2022-47021 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A null pointer dereference issue was discovered in functions op_get_data and op_open1 in opusfile.c in xiph opusfile 0.9 thru 0.12 allows attackers to cause denial of service or other unspecified impacts.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47021` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopusfile0 - 0.12-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: opusfile package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.12-4').
